text: "Limburg, mijn Vaderland" ("Limburg, my Fatherland") is the anthem of two regions, Dutch Limburg and Belgian Limburg. ==Lyrics== Most of the time only the first verse is sung, plus the second one sometimes. The fourth verse is not sung in Belgium because it talks about the strong ties between the Netherlands and the House of Orange-Nassau. ==References== Category:Belgian anthems Category:Dutch anthems
title: Limburg mijn Vaderland
